summary: During the turbulent days of the French Revolution, Frenchwoman Lucie Manette (Dorothy Tutin) falls in love with Englishman Charles Darnay (Paul Guers), who's hiding his true identity and purpose.
cast: Dirk Bogarde|Dorothy Tutin|Cecil Parker|Stephen Murray|Athene Seyler|Paul Guers|Marie Versini|Ian Bannen|Alfie Bass|Ernest Clark|Rosalie Crutchley|Freda Jackson|Duncan Lamont|Christopher Lee|Leo McKern|Donald Pleasence|Eric Pohlmann|Chris Adcock|Dominique Boschero|Wallace Bosco|Yves Brainville|Michael Brennan|Daniel Brown|Peter Copley|Dominique Davray|Lesley Dudley|Jacques Dufilho|Bernard Foreman|Chick Fowles|Danny Green|Raymond James|Barry Johns|Gerry Judge|Harold Kasket|Frederick Kelsey|Cyril Kent|Sam Kydd|Jack May|Laurence Payne|Sacha PitoÃ«ff|Dido Plumb|Charles Price|Robert Rietty|George Rose|George Spence|Charles Stevenson|Reg Thomason|Alan Tilvern|Ian Whittaker|Brian Wilde|George Woodbridge
title: Historia de dos ciudades
